items.title: birthstone
items.name: Birthstone Generator
items.description: The birthstone generator displays your birthstone using a dropdown selector.
skills: HTML/CSS, Javascript, Web Design, 3D Design using Blender
acknowledgements: In collaboration with: Arcade Campfa and Yellow Back Books

items.title: cardiffBookshopMap
items.name: Cardiff Bookshop Map
items.pageDescription: Cardiff Bookshop Map is produced by Yellow Back Books alongside writer and editor Hati Gibson. The project was developed as part of Gibon's Yellow Back Books residency at Arcade Campfa. The map is an A2 folded format.
items.description: The Cardiff Bookshop Map is a not-for-profit project offering greater visibility to Cardiff's independent bookshops and reading rooms. The map was available physically (in 2022) from ArcadeCampfa and independent bookshops across Cardiff.
skills: HTML/CSS, Javascript, Web Design, 3D Design using Blender
acknowledgements: In collaboration with: Arcade Campfa and Yellow Back Books
